channel.title: Mopar when is the new modified client coming out?
channel.description:
Mopar when is the new modified client coming out?
Been waiting forever for MoparScape. :( How come there isn't any news posted on your site. I really liked your last one. You disabled all or most of the autoing traps and connected to the real RuneScape so people could auto. And you had those sick features like having your health on top of your character.
Please reply with some news on it. Oh ya, and I'm posting this here rather than PMing incase anyone else has any news on it. :)

item.title: Mopar when is the new modified client coming out?
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

Greeny:

Might I just add I think it’s been said but the client changes randomly all the time now, just small trivial things but adding to detectability. Deob Java based clients/bots are in my eyes over.

…I dont need the deob for a bot :s, the only bot im working on is ARGA and as you know it does not use deobs ;). I need the deob fr something else.

Thanks mopar. :), didnt see it there.

Read full topic
item.source: Mopar when is the new modified client coming out?

item.title: Mopar when is the new modified client coming out?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“David, post:13, topic:4717”]Dcthugs has made a deobber and a bot, and apparently TehFreak says he has, but doesn’t want to release it or something.

It isn’t impossible.[/quote]

I sent dcthugs my deobber, not that it matters anyway, you cant even deobfuscate the client without making it detectable

Read full topic

item.title: Mopar when is the new modified client coming out?
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“David, post:13, topic:4717”]Dcthugs has made a deobber and a bot, and apparently TehFreak says he has, but doesn’t want to release it or something.

It isn’t impossible.[/quote]
the only bender that ever worked was based off of aryan.
Bender has been in development for over 5 monts now.
I see him online but i hdkilla says hes is away

Why would he be packet sniffinf if he had a deob???

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Mopar when is the new modified client coming out?

also get some noob friendly uploading dang lol they ask so much.
[/quote]

or a coughwebappletcough ;)[/quote]
mopar i have a possible web client solution. It uses java and jni to create a internet explorer instace. It is implementable but one issue is the html tags have to be
instead of so i haven’t gotten it work on runescape.com. yet

item.title: Mopar when is the new modified client coming out?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

moparisthebest:

MoparScape Private Server Client 3.0 will be coming out shortly, with new features noone has ever seen or thought of before, so you can look forward to that

YAY! That’s great man. Not the first two paragraphs, but the paragraph I quoted.

Read full topic
item.source: Mopar when is the new modified client coming out?

item.title: Mopar when is the new modified client coming out?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

the moparscape pking/SCARable client is most likely never coming back ever due to any client decompiled and recompiled being detectable by default

however it is possible that it could be remade with somthing like a modified jvm or jvmti, but It seems like alot more work than its worth, Im not sure

MoparScape Private Server Client 3.0 will be coming out shortly, with new features noone has ever seen or thought of before, so you can look forward to that

Read full topic
item.source: Mopar when is the new modified client coming out?

item.title: Mopar when is the new modified client coming out?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I’m not much into RS. I haven’t been a member for 6 months. I recently became one oday though, and once again started playing. That’s when I looked it up, and wanted to know about it. It’s not like we have a website where there is news posted on MoparScape. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Mopar when is the new modified client coming out?
item.dc:creator: @Vipsta Vipsta
item.description:
@Vipsta wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:3, topic:4717”]Noooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo
ooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo
oooooooooooo… NO! damit that sucks dude.

Well… Why can’t we decompile it? We download the data off RuneScape everytime we play the game, so isn’t it stored somewhere on the computer in the temp folder? Then get a java decompiler… and decompile it? It should be that easy. :D[/quote]

Its much more complicated. We need to decompile it, and deobfuscate it.
Our deobfuscator is in need of an update, also.

Read full topic
